author: Cherlynn Low
title: A VR workout app killed my quads
description: “Part Beat Saber, part Dance Dance Revolution, part Guitar Hero with your whole body.” That’s how a rep for VR studio Within described its latest exercise app — Supernatural. That summary left me skeptical but intrigued. Setting aside my manic lifelo...
content: I launched the app, answered a few questions about my fitness level and goals, and then an athletic woman appeared, walking me through a tutorial. First, I had to define my room’s boundaries so I didn’t go crashing into a wall. She also suggested using a yoga… [+5835 chars]
